name: write
description:
Create or overwrite a file. Parent directories are created automatically.

Useful for:
- creating new files
- full rewrites
- resolving patch/edit failures on small files

Accepted arg aliases:
- file / filename / file_path / filepath / file_name -> path
- text / data / code / body / source -> content

Notes:
- This operation replaces the full file content.
- Include all content you want to keep.

Examples:
- {{tool:write}}({"path": "config.json", "content": "{\"debug\": true}"})
- {{tool:write}}({"file": "app.js", "code": "...full file..."})

Returns: ok: created/updated path, +N lines
